thread.title: HRH the Crown Prince, Jordan's King Affirm Support for Qatar against Israeli Aggression

author: John Pike
title: HRH the Crown Prince, Jordan's King Affirm Support for Qatar against Israeli Aggression
text:
HRH the Crown Prince, Jordan's King Affirm Support for Qatar against Israeli Aggression
Saudi Press Agency
Tuesday 17/03/1447
Riyadh, September 09, 2025, SPA -- His Royal Highness Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, Crown Prince and Prime Minister, today received a telephone call from King Abdullah II ibn Al Hussein of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan.
The conversation addressed Israeli aggression and the flagrant violation of the sovereignty of the State of Qatar.
The two leaders affirmed that Saudi Arabia and Jordan stand with Qatar and support any measures it takes to protect its security and preserve its sovereignty.
-- SPA
23:04 Local Time 20:04 GMT
